name: Nova Chain
description: Nova Chain is a full-stack Layer 2 ecosystem built on Ethereum, with native tools such as NovaBot+ (Telegram trending service), NovaSwap (DEX), NovaWallet, and a built-in Launchpad. It aims to provide community-driven growth, ultra-low gas fees, high throughput, and integrated token utility rather than simply being a “scaling chain”. $NOVA powers Pulswitch.io the first all crypto social media platform.
